QuestData.Title: Refleshification
QuestData.Description: <The nearby radio calls out to you.>$B$BHey $n, you got that gun? Good! Don't point it directly at your eye.$B$BAim that baby at my stonified workers and the refracted light should reverse the petrification process. Or it will melt them. Whatever. Return my workers to a state of profitability! And if the refleshification process makes them crazy-go-nuts, they should be killed for insurance purposes. Horzak OUT!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use The Refleshifier to de-stonify eight Mountainfoot Miners within the Mountainfoot Strip Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hey look, all your limbs are intact.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, good. Now we can get these slackers back to work. You've earned a cut of the profits though - minus the usual company fees. Take your pick!
